paid clicks were up 11 percent from the prior quarter and 18 percent from the year-ago quarter. "Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year," Google CEO Eric Schmidt said in a statement. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. Google's results may offset the uncertainty surrounding the announcement of Eric Schmidt 's exit on April 4 as CEO. taking over as CEO and will oversee day-to-day operations, including product and technology development.
